name: Chain Vest

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
levelupDescription: My shadows and I have <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> the enemy Nexus twice<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: My shadows and I have struck the enemy Nexus twice.
flavorText: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."
name: Zed

description:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Katarina</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Shuffle a Katarina into your deck.
flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina
name: Katarina's Death Lotus

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
flavorText: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran
name: Trifarian Hopeful

description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Braum</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Shuffle a Braum into your deck.
flavorText: "... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!" - The Tale of Braum
name: Braum's Take Heart

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.
name: Mistwraith

description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius
name: Might

description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavorText: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."
name: Silent Shadowseer

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Unleashed Spirits</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Unleashed Spirits.
flavorText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.
name: Haunted Relic

description: Grant an ally +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavorText: Power, but at what cost?
name: Mark of the Isles

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen allies gain Barrier 4+ times.
flavorText: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."
name: Shen

flavorText: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.
name: Precious Pet

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavorText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, Gatekeeper
name: Chempunk Shredder

description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
flavorText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder
name: Lonely Poro

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Create in hand a spell from your regions.
flavorText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."
name: Karma

description: Steal an enemy follower this round. <style=Parentheses>(Can't play if you have 6 allies already.)</style>
descriptionRaw: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies already.)
flavorText: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.
name: Possession

description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian Ensign
name: Radiant Guardian

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand an Epic card from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand an Epic card from your regions.
flavorText: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."
name: Eminent Benefactor

description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina
name: Death Lotus

flavorText: "TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface
name: Mk0: Windup Shredder

description: Your <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> spells cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Your Burst spells cost 1 less.
flavorText: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.
name: Cloud Drinker

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +2|+2.
flavorText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."
name: Laurent Bladekeeper

description: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH Round Start.
flavorText: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.
name: Warmother's Call

description: If you've played <style=Variable>20</style> cards with different names this game, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Catastrophe</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: If you've played 20 cards with different names this game, summon Catastrophe.
flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project Engineer
name: Purrsuit of Perfection

description: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
descriptionRaw: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
flavorText: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.
name: Blade of Ledros

description: All of your spells and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: All of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"
name: Funsmith

description: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and 1|1.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral and 1|1.
flavorText: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian Soldier
name: Splinter Soul

description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
flavorText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.
name: Atrocity

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Yasuo</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an attacking enemy.
Shuffle a Yasuo into your deck.
flavorText: "Hasagi!"- Yasuo
name: Yasuo's Steel Tempest

flavorText: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.
name: Living Shadow

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit.
flavorText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.
name: Will of Ionia

description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavorText: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia
name: Feral Mystic

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Recall 3 enemies.
flavorText: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand
name: Skyward Strikes

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
flavorText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"
name: Navori Bladescout

description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Health.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Frostbite enemies with 3 or less Health.
flavorText: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Icy Yeti

description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
flavorText: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.
name: Shunpo

description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
flavorText:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!" - Zaunite nursery rhyme
name: Poison Puffcap

description: Deal 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavorText: "Let the show begin!" - Chempunk Shredder
name: Face-Melter

description: Revive a random ally that died this round.
descriptionRaw: Revive a random ally that died this round.
flavorText: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless Vindicator
name: Mist's Call

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora
name: Single Combat

flavorText: Your end is MEOW.
name: Catastrophe

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
flavorText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General
name: Trifarian Assessor

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
name: Prismatic Barrier

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each other attacking ally, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: For each other attacking ally, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."
name: Vladimir

description: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."
name: Professor von Yipp

flavorText: "It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1
name: Mk1: Wrenchbot

levelupDescription: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
levelupDescriptionRaw: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
flavorText: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."
name: Tryndamere

flavorText: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.
name: Bull Elnuk

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavorText: They're hungriest when they hatch.
name: Brood Awakening

description: Give allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.
name: Pack Mentality

description: Grant me +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +4|+0 and Quick Attack once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.
name: Unstable Voltician

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavorText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.
name: Wraithcaller

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"
name: Sparring Student

description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Shuffle an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ashe</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Frostbite an enemy.
Shuffle an Ashe into your deck.
flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
name: Ashe's Flash Freeze

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavorText: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere
name: Tarkaz the Tribeless

description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper
name: Elixir of Iron

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavorText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"
name: Greenglade Duo

description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.
name: Blood for Blood

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon two 1 cost allies from your deck.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon two 1 cost allies from your deck.
flavorText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.
name: Kinkou Wayfinder

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> once. When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck once. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."
name: Katarina

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: The next time an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally attacks, revive me attacking.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: The next time an Ephemeral ally attacks, revive me attacking.
flavorText: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon
name: Shark Chariot

description: When I'm summoned, shuffle an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link> into the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, shuffle an Enraged Yeti into the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."
name: Avarosan Trapper

description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
descriptionRaw: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
name: Progress Day!

flavorText: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."
name: Yusari

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
flavorText: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Vrynna, Scarmother
name: Troop of Elnuks

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavorText: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.
name: Health Potion

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally, then revive it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
flavorText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.
name: Chronicler of Ruin

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: You have twenty seconds to comply.
name: Plaza Guardian

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Fiend</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
flavorText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”
name: Ren Shadowblade

description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavorText: "Cease your march and turn back your armies. The eye of winter has spied your conquest, and its icy claw closes tight about your treasonous hearts."
name: Anivia

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
flavorText: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!
name: Ethereal Remitter

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Cloud</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
flavorText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Clump of Whumps

description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavorText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."
name: Emerald Awakener

description: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
flavorText: "... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!" - The Tale of Braum
name: Take Heart

flavorText: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie
name: Savage Reckoner

description: Give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give allies Challenger this round.
flavorText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora
name: En Garde

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 3 from any unit.
descriptionRaw: Drain 3 from any unit.
flavorText: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.
name: Grasp of the Undying

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
flavorText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.
name: Spectral Matron

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Frostbite the Strongest enemy.
flavorText: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."
name: Rimetusk Shaman

description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
flavorText: No.
name: Deny

flavorText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.
name: Trifarian Gloryseeker

description: When I'm discarded, summon me.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, summon me.
flavorText: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx
name: Flame Chompers!

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If I'm in hand, reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Round End: If I'm in hand, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: Ancient Yeti

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian Ensign
name: Vanguard Sergeant

description: Deal 1 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavorText: Gotcha.
name: Bullseye

flavorText: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder
name: Mighty Poro

flavorText: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.
name: Navori Brigand

flavorText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.
name: Arachnoid Horror

description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx
name: Get Excited!

flavorText: "PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep." - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6
name: Mk6: Stormlobber

description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."
name: Senna, Sentinel of Light

description: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
flavorText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere
name: Bloodsworn Pledge

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
flavorText: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”
name: Navori Highwayman

flavorText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General
name: The Empyrean

description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion
name: Back to Back

description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
name: Decimate

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each other attacking ally, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: For each other attacking ally, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...
name: Vladimir

description:
Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw:
Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
flavorText: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.
name: Flash of Brilliance

description:
Deal 2 to anything.
Shuffle an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ezreal</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to anything.
Shuffle an Ezreal into your deck.
flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal
name: Ezreal's Mystic Shot

description: Give allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!"
name: For Demacia!

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.
name: Basilisk Rider

description: When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."
name: Greenglade Caretaker

description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian
name: Radiant Strike

description: When I'm summoned, revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> dead allied champion.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, revive the Strongest dead allied champion.
flavorText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?
name: The Rekindler

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
name: Flash Freeze

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Clouds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Mushroom Clouds in hand.
flavorText: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Chump Whump

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
flavorText: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.
name: Hecarim

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III
name: Brightsteel Protector

description: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: That which kills us makes them stronger.
name: Withering Wail

flavorText: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan Engineer
name: Amateur Aeronaut

description:
Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shen</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
Shuffle a Shen into your deck.
flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen
name: Shen's Stand United

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill the 2 Weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian Soldier
name: Rhasa the Sunderer

description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavorText: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."
name: Anivia

flavorText: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius
name: Affectionate Poro

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.
name: Intrepid Mariner

levelupDescription: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
name: Lux

description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fiora</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
Shuffle a Fiora into your deck.
flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
name: Fiora's Riposte

description: When I'm summoned, move <link=card.dravenRef><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"
name: Draven's Biggest Fan

description: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.
name: Glacial Storm

flavorText: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Jericho Swain
name: Reckless Trifarian

flavorText: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.
name: Darkwater Scourge

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavorText: "Hasegi!"- Yasuo
name: Steel Tempest

flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."
name: Cithria of Cloudfield

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.
name: Vanguard Firstblade

description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Shuffle a Vladimir into your deck.
flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
name: Vladimir's Transfusion

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Heart of the Fluft</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Heart of the Fluft.
flavorText:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"
name: Fluft of Poros

description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.
name: Fleetfeather Tracker

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen
name: Spirit's Refuge

description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
flavorText: "When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist." - Noxian Axiom
name: Elixir of Wrath

flavorText: "Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!" - Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4
name: Mk4: Apex Turret

levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you're <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>, transform me back into <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Anivia</style></link> and Level Up.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round Start: If you're Enlightened, transform me back into Anivia and Level Up.
flavorText: In the depths of winter's cold embrace, the Freljord's guardian awaits the hour of her return.
name: Eggnivia

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavorText: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger
name: Sumpworks Map

flavorText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.
name: Vanguard Cavalry

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Draw a spell.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Draw a spell.
flavorText: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."
name: Rivershaper

description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
flavorText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.
name: Chempunk Pickpocket

description: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."
name: Starlit Seer

description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all other allies.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Recall all other allies.
flavorText: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."
name: Solitary Monk

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavorText: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer
name: She Who Wanders

description: If you have a Yeti, summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link>. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
flavorText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Tall Tales

description: Kill a damaged unit to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Noxian Guillotine</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
flavorText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.
name: Noxian Guillotine

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
flavorText: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite Foreman
name: Caustic Cask

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand another <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> follower that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand another Last Breath follower that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…
name: Warden's Prey

description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
name: Discipline of Force

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
name: Shadowshift

description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
flavorText: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."
name: Crimson Awakener

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link> in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Create a Detain in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."
name: Mageseeker Investigator

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."
name: Kato The Arm

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
name: Vile Feast

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
flavorText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Tavernkeeper
name: They Who Endure

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other battling allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other battling allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”
name: Cithria the Bold

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."
name: Yone, Windchaser

description:
Grant <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen
name: Ki Guardian

description: Kill ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Kill ALL units.
flavorText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.
name: The Ruination

description: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
descriptionRaw: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
flavorText: "You're mine. Forever."Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...
name: Thresh

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc
name: Guile

description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"
name: Babbling Bjerg

description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"
name: Vanguard Redeemer

flavorText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.
name: Garen

description:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena Regular
name: Spinning Axe

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."
name: Avarosan Sentry

flavorText: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian Soldier
name: Soulgorger

description: Pick a follower. Create an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
flavorText: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.
name: Fading Memories

flavorText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.
name: Silverwing Diver

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0.
flavorText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...
name: Subpurrsible

flavorText: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand
name: Shellshocker

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Get an empty mana gem.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Get an empty mana gem.
flavorText: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.
name: Wolfrider

description: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
flavorText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.
name: Veteran Investigator

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.
name: The Leviathan

flavorText: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer
name: Slippery Waverider

flavorText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.
name: Loyal Badgerbear

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal allies 3.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Heal allies 3.
flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai
name: Sap Magic

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand
name: Gangplank

description: <style=Variable></style>
flavorText:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam
name: The Beast Below

description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a Gangplank into your deck.
flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
name: Gangplank's Parrrley

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"
name: Gotcha!

flavorText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."
name: Prowling Cutthroat

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavorText: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal
name: Deadbloom Wanderer

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Mischievous little scamps, ain't they? More help than they seem, but word is they've got explosive tempers..." - Syren deckhand
name: Powder Monkey

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"She swallowed me whole, me skiff and me soul,
So I'm singin' this song in her belly,
And now I must wait 'til I meet my fate,
In the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
name: Devour

description:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate
name: Pocket Aces

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."
name: Crackshot Corsair

description:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> backrow enemy.
<link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, Stun the Strongest backrow enemy.
Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."
name: Swain

description:
Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Shuffle a Miss Fortune into your deck.
flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune
name: Miss Fortune's Make it Rain

description:
When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warning Shot</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, create a Warning Shot in hand.
Allegiance: Nab 1.
flavorText: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."
name: Yordle Grifter

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."
name: Miss Fortune

description:
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
Deal 5 to ALL units.
descriptionRaw:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Deal 5 to ALL units.
flavorText: The deckhands roared as one and hauled the chains, their treasure now just below the calm waters. Little did they know the Seascraw's legendary cannon had one final act in store.
name: Keelbreaker

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani
name: Caught in the Cold

flavorText: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.
name: Bubble Bear

description:
To play me, discard 2.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 2 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, discard 2.
Attack: Draw 2 Fleeting.
flavorText: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."
name: Brash Gambler

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vault Breaker</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi
name: Vault Breaker

description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a 1 cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create in hand a 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavorText: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.
name: Coral Creatures

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”
name: Citybreaker

flavorText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.
name: Greathorn Companion

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "...master the enemy." - Lee Sin
name: Resonating Strike

description: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
flavorText:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Double Trouble

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Scout.
flavorText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous
name: Island Navigator

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant 1 cost allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant 1 cost allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.
name: Jagged Taskmaster

flavorText: "Life here… so effortless. Verdant forests... to sprout overnight… quite exquisite. What a treasure this land is. Must preserve… generations." - Recovered journal
name: Sapling

description: When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Concussive Palm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm Recalled, transform me into Concussive Palm.
flavorText: "A student must move with grace, for the Dragon's breath created the wind and waves which brought motion to our world." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Tail of the Dragon

flavorText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."
name: Greenfang Warden

description:
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and shuffle 2 Treasures into your deck.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 2 and shuffle 2 Treasures into your deck.
flavorText: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher
name: Shipwreck Hoarder

description:
Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Quinn</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Summon Valor.
Shuffle a Quinn into your deck.
flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
name: Quinn's Blinding Assault

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Toss 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
flavorText: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal
name: Thorny Toad

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Place a follower in play into your hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Place a follower in play into your hand.
flavorText: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer
name: Strong-arm

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then Rally.
flavorText: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."
name: Citrus Courier

description:
Sea Monster allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>. 
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Sea Monster allies have Fearsome. 
Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.
name: Terror of the Tides

description:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
Shuffle a Swain into your deck.
flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
name: Swain's Ravenous Flock

description: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Most people don't get close enough to see the craftsmanship on these guns. Lucky you."
name: Miss Fortune

description: Grant an ally +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+3.
flavorText: "The Dragon will keep you safe." - Scales of the Dragon
name: Dragon's Protection

description: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 Fleeting.
flavorText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook
name: Insightful Investigator

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
name: Devourer of the Depths

description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> and stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me.
<link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Chum the Waters</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When you cast a spell, give me Elusive and stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me.
Nexus Strike: Create a Chum the Waters in hand.
flavorText: ...while others insist he's just a playful child who safeguards others on their journeys home.
name: Fizz

flavorText: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.
name: Valor

description: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Longtooth</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and summon Longtooth.
flavorText: "Shark!" - Fizz
name: Chum the Waters

description: Deal 1 three times to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 three times to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Even if you fail to hear the bawdy cries of her crew, there's no way you'll miss her laughter...
name: Bullet Time

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Loyal Badgerbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Loyal Badgerbear.
flavorText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."
name: Grizzled Ranger

description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When you cast a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you cast another, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."
name: Lee Sin

description: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
flavorText: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.
name: Zap Sprayfin

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher
name: Razorscale Hunter

description: Deal 1 to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "A little something to remember me by." - Miss Fortune
name: Love Tap

description: When another ally dies, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal
name: Neverglade Collector

description: Deal 2 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 and Stun the Strongest enemy.
flavorText: "All that glitters..." - Twisted Fate
name: Gold Card

description:
Create 5 random cards in hand. They cost 0 and are <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
descriptionRaw:
Create 5 random cards in hand. They cost 0 and are Fleeting.
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
flavorText: Captain Finn roared out "Ye earned this, boys! Told ye the Tithe was nothin' but coward feed!" Some cheered, but not all. The waters seemed to still, save for the bubbles around the Rancour's hull.
name: Treasure Trove

description: When you draw a card, give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> and create an exact copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: When you draw a card, give it Fleeting and create an exact copy of it in hand.
flavorText: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.
name: Chief Mechanist Zevi

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Powder Kegs.
flavorText: "Barrel!" - Gangplank
name: More Powder!

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal allies 3.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Maokai</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Heal allies 3.
Shuffle a Maokai into your deck.
flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai
name: Maokai's Sap Magic

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all damaged enemies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Stun all damaged enemies.
flavorText: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”
name: Aurok Glinthorn

description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.
name: Unyielding Spirit

description: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies Vulnerable.
flavorText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.
name: Sheriff Lariette Rose

description: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Overgrown Snapvine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
flavorText: "Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!" - Recovered journal
name: Overgrown Snapvine

flavorText: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Horns of the Dragon

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.
name: Jagged Butcher

description: The first 3 times you play a card each round, I play a Destiny Card.
descriptionRaw: The first 3 times you play a card each round, I play a Destiny Card.
flavorText: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."
name: Twisted Fate

description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: Gangplank's cruelty doesn't end with those who wrong him. To make an enemy of the Saltwater Scourge is to bring death upon everyone you hold dear.
name: Cannon Barrage

description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
name: Parrrley

description:
<link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1.
flavorText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"
name: Abyssal Eye

flavorText: "The spirit gives to those who listen." - Eye of the Dragon
name: Dragonling

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.
name: Sejuani

description: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Jailbreak

description: Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 Fleeting at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
name: Pick a Card

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme
name: Ember Maiden

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Powder Keg.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz
name: Playful Trickster

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Shuffle that unit into the enemy deck if there's an ally <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
Shuffle that unit into the enemy deck if there's an ally Nautilus.
flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus
name: Riptide

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Saplings</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to summon 2 Saplings.
flavorText: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"
name: Blighted Caretaker

description:
