When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
I <link=card.attackSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Rage</style></link> enemies that I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you cast a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you cast another, give me Barrier this round.
I Dragon's Rage enemies that I Challenge.
flavorText: "...But for the tyrant, the Dragon breathes fire."
name: Lee Sin

description:
Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Twisted Fate</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Shuffle a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 Fleeting at the next Round Start.
Shuffle a Twisted Fate into your deck.
flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link> if you cast 2+ spells last round<style=Variable></style>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Summon a Dragonling if you cast 2+ spells last round.
flavorText: "A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Eye of the Dragon

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Shuffle that enemy into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
Shuffle that enemy into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
Shuffle a Nautilus into your deck.
flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus
name: Nautilus's Riptide

description: Summon me from hand once you've played 2 spells this round.
descriptionRaw: Summon me from hand once you've played 2 spells this round.
flavorText: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Claws of the Dragon

description: The first time you play another ally each round, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time you play another ally each round, Toss 2 and summon a Sapling.
levelupDescription: Your units have died or your cards have been <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> 25 times.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Your units have died or your cards have been Tossed 25 times.
flavorText: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.
name: Maokai

description: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card <style=Parentheses>(max +8|+0)</style>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0).
flavorText: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator
name: Vi

description: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.
name: Barkbeast

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavorText: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.
name: Dreg Dredgers

description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
name: Ravenous Flock

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link> or a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Powder Keg or a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."
name: Swain

description: When I Level Up, copy <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I Level Up, copy Tossed allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note
name: Nautilus

description: Other allies with 5+ Power have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Other allies with 5+ Power have Overwhelm.
flavorText: Fully unleashed, the Ursine shed their humanity and take on the power of the storm. They tear across the frozen steppes, their roars echoing like peals of thunder.
name: Stormclaw Ursine

description:
When I'm summoned and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned and Round Start: Summon a Powder Keg.
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Seen his eyes enough to know. Ain't nothin' but pure anger there. Someday, the boss'll do to Bilgewater what it did to him." - Petty Officer
name: Gangplank

description:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw 1 of them.
descriptionRaw:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
Plunder: Draw 1 of them.
flavorText: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider
name: Shared Spoils

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavorText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."
name: Dreadway Deckhand

description:
Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
Play: Draw a Gangplank.
flavorText:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"
name: The Dreadway

description:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal <style=Variable>1</style> extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Where there's a keg, there's a way." - Bilgewater saying
name: Powder Keg

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy to summon a <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Tail of the Dragon</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy to summon a Tail of the Dragon.
flavorText: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon
name: Concussive Palm

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."
name: Imperial Demolitionist

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavorText: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.
name: Slotbot

flavorText: The terrifying beasts burst through the waves and split the hull with vice-like jaws. Though the sailors begged the Bearded Lady for mercy, their captain's greed had already sealed their fate.
name: Vicious Platewyrm

description: Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon Valor.
flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
name: Blinding Assault

description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain
name: Noxian Fervor

description:
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
Play: Draw a Sejuani.
flavorText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard
name: The Tuskraider

description:
Give an ally +4|+4 this round.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +4|+4 this round.
Shuffle a Sejuani into your deck.
flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
name: Sejuani's Fury of the North

description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
name: Dragon's Rage

description: Create in hand a 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Create in hand a 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
flavorText: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."
name: Trail of Evidence

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.
name: Genevieve Elmheart

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Protection</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Dragon's Protection in hand.
flavorText: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Scales of the Dragon

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Play a Destiny Card.
descriptionRaw: Play: Play a Destiny Card.
flavorText: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."
name: Twisted Fate

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Narwhal</style></link> for your opponent.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Golden Narwhal for your opponent.
flavorText: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.
name: Hunting Fleet

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
The first time you damage the enemy Nexus each round, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
The first time you damage the enemy Nexus each round, Frostbite all enemies.
flavorText: "Lay them low! Show them the Freljord belongs to the Winter's Claw!"
name: Sejuani

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Return</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to create a Fleeting Return in hand.
flavorText: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...
name: Retreat

description: This round, set all allies' Power and Health to the number of spells you've played this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: This round, set all allies' Power and Health to the number of spells you've played this game.
flavorText: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.
name: Mind Meld

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
flavorText: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying
name: Scrapshot

description: Give an ally +4|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +4|+4 this round.
flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
name: Fury of the North

description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Blow 'em to the depths!" - Gangplank
name: Powderful Explosion

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
flavorText: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter
name: Smooth Soloist

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon Valor Challenging the Strongest enemy.
flavorText: "I'll follow your lead, Valor!"
name: Quinn

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Cast <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Cannon Barrage</style></link> 7 times on randomly targeted enemies.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Cast Cannon Barrage 7 times on randomly targeted enemies.
flavorText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"
name: Riptide Rex

description:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
descriptionRaw:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies everywhere by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
flavorText: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.
name: Lure of the Depths

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Sapling at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling
name: Sapling Toss

description: Give allies <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give allies Tough this round.
flavorText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden
name: Ranger's Resolve

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Set an ally to 4|4.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Set an ally to 4|4.
flavorText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
name: Suit Up!

description:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune
name: Double Up

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune
name: Monkey Idol

description:
When I Level Up, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I Level Up, Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
Round Start: Summon a Sapling.
flavorText: He would destroy the blight within these isles, and restore its long-lost life.
name: Maokai

description: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
descriptionRaw: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
flavorText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider
name: Armored Tuskrider

description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Pick an enemy. 2 allies strike it.
flavorText: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden
name: Concerted Strike

description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
name: Dragon's Rage

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2.
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 2.
Draw 2.
flavorText: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk before all's lost to the deep.
name: Salvage

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link>.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Miss Fortune.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.
name: The Syren

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me 2 random keywords.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me 2 random keywords.
flavorText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank
name: Plunder Poro

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 Fleeting at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler
name: Pool Shark

description: When I'm summoned, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the Strongest enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."
name: Hired Gun

description: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
flavorText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...
name: Fizz

description:
<link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 more.
descriptionRaw:
Nab 1.
Plunder: Nab 1 more.
flavorText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.
name: Pilfered Goods

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I transform into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Stormclaw Ursine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
flavorText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.
name: Ursine Spiritwalker

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
flavorText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.
name: Jaull Hunters

description:
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vicious Platewyrms</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Summon 3 Vicious Platewyrms.
flavorText: The grizzled captain held his shining quarry aloft and roared out "This'll keep us fer life!" Heady cheers rang out from the crew, while around their brig, the waters began to churn...
name: Platewyrm Egg

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
flavorText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"
name: Mystifying Magician

flavorText: Though there may be ambiguity surrounding Fizz's temperament and intentions, there's absolutely none when it comes to Longtooth.
name: Longtooth

description: When I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link> a unit while attacking, deal 5 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I Strike a unit while attacking, deal 5 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "So! Looks like your buddies are all tuckered out. You wanna tell me where you hid the hextech, or d'ya wanna make friends with the wall, too?"
name: Vi

description:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate
name: Blue Card

description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon Valor.
flavorText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight
name: Quinn

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
flavorText: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand
name: Ye Been Warned

description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lee Sin</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
Shuffle a Lee Sin into your deck.
flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
name: Lee Sin's Dragon's Rage

description: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
descriptionRaw: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
flavorText: ...and how they rallied. The survivors soon gathered their forces, found their center, and showed the invaders the resilient spirit of the First Lands.
name: Return

description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate
name: Red Card

description:
Costs 2 less if you cast 2+ spells last round.
Draw 2 other spells.
descriptionRaw:
Costs 2 less if you cast 2+ spells last round.
Draw 2 other spells.
flavorText: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.
name: Deep Meditation

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw a random non-champion from the enemy hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Draw a random non-champion from the enemy hand.
flavorText: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate
name: Sleight of Hand

flavorText: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.
name: Golden Narwhal

description: Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune
name: Make it Rain

description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Nab 1.
flavorText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"
name: Black Market Merchant

description: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The hazards of using black powder are a small price to pay for tactical victory.
name: Black Powder Grenade

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Captain's orders: bullet to the face!" - Crackshot Corsair
name: Crackshot

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vault Breaker</style></link> in hand.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vi</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
Shuffle a Vi into your deck.
flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi
name: Vi's Vault Breaker

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer
name: Warning Shot

description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain
name: Death's Hand

description: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
flavorText: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.
name: Patrol Wardens

flavorText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer
name: Iron Ballista

flavorText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.
name: Ruthless Raider

description:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fizz</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
Shuffle a Fizz into your deck.
flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz
name: Fizz's Playful Trickster

description: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
descriptionRaw: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
flavorText: All pay the tithe, one way or another.
name: Nautilus

description: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 4.
descriptionRaw: Toss 4.
flavorText: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer
name: Jettison

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Resonating Strike</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
flavorText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin
name: Sonic Wave

description: Create 2 random Poros and 2 <link=card.snaxRef><style=AssociatedCard>Poro Snax</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create 2 random Poros and 2 Poro Snax in hand.
flavorText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Aurora Porealis
